channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report X-2024072464
item.description:
Report X-2024072464

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found in the unload at NOKC 732 wet from a bottle of CloroxPro germicidal bleach that had a loose cap. Upon inspection, package is an undeclared hazmat. Package was placed into a red tote with a hazmat bag.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: Package arrived wet at OKLA731. Package came from DALL753 trailer 560862. One glass bottle was broken causing contents to leak. Package was left in a heated trailer, causing the glass bottles to become fragile.
